Microsoft does not make hybrid x86/x64 dvds, so this cannot be retail.  It can, however, use retail sources.  I will test the install.wim files from this and see if it appears to use retail eulas or MSDN rtm eulas.  Most people who post MSDN iso files don't realize they are not retail.

Done testing.  This is RTM.  Someone has exported a prox86 and a prox64 image into a single install.wim.  The eula is RTM and the files all have july dates like the rtm.

So basically the claim that it is Retail is false. That is a lie.
